page.title: 06RIDING STABLES-WASHINGTON
page.content: Most{Saturdays}I get up at 8.00 in the morning.First I go downstairs and have my breakfast which is usually Weetabix.After that I get dressed in jodhpurs,jumpers and a jacket.I then get washed.After that I make my dinner which is usually beef spread sandwiches,a Marsbar and a packet of Salt'n'Vinegar crisps.At 8.45 I go to catch the bus,either the 192,198 or the 185,which takes me to the Galleries.Its now 8.55.The next bus I have to catch is the X4.Its an express which takes me to the {Riverside {Riding Centre.}I help out there.I do things like putting the bridle and saddle on,lead people who can't ride properly,groom the horses,take out the dirty bedding and put clean in.My father comes for me at 5.30.When I go home I go in the bath,watch television then go to bed.
